data.lyric:
[ti:Overpass Graffiti]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:=]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.34]Overpass Graffiti - Ed Sheeran
[00:01.13]Composed by：Ed Sheeran/Fred Gibson/Johnny McDaid
[00:02.63]
[00:06.38]This is a dark parade
[00:08.29]
[00:09.31]Another rough patch to rain on to rain on
[00:14.66]
[00:17.31]I know your friends may say
[00:19.16]
[00:19.99]This is a cause for celebration
[00:22.65]
[00:23.64]Hip hip hooray love
[00:25.51]
[00:27.51]Photographs in sepia tones
[00:30.07]So still the fire is barely fighting the cold alone
[00:35.93]
[00:37.60]There are times when I can feel your ghost
[00:40.62]
[00:41.18]Just when I'm almost letting you go
[00:44.05]
[00:46.13]The cards were stacked against us both
[00:49.25]
[00:49.90]I will always love you for what it's worth
[00:54.28]
[00:55.65]We'll never fade like graffiti on the overpass
[00:59.80]
[01:00.90]I know time may change the way your think of us
[01:05.28]
[01:05.86]But I'll remember the way we were
[01:07.77]You were the first full stop love that will never leave
[01:12.17]
[01:13.66]And baby you will never be lost on me
[01:16.46]
[01:28.45]This is a god d**n shame
[01:29.98]
[01:30.98]I never wanted to break it
[01:33.67]
[01:34.70]And leave us tainted
[01:36.37]
[01:39.33]Know I should walk away
[01:40.75]
[01:42.02]But I just can't replace us
[01:44.52]
[01:45.68]Or even erase us
[01:47.21]
[01:49.24]The car was stuck the engine stalled
[01:51.89]Both of us got caught out in the snow alone
[01:57.76]
[01:59.49]There were times when I forget the lows
[02:02.71]And think the highs were all that we'd ever know
[02:05.84]
[02:08.00]The cards were stacked against us both
[02:11.15]
[02:11.95]I will always love you for what it's worth
[02:16.13]
[02:17.49]We'll never fade like graffiti on the overpass
[02:21.59]
[02:22.59]I know time may change the way your think of us
[02:27.48]But I'll remember the way we were
[02:29.56]You were the first full stop love that will never leave
[02:34.17]
[02:35.49]And baby you will never be lost on me
[02:38.34]
[02:42.96]Lost on me
[02:44.22]
[02:46.64]Baby you will never be lost on me
[02:49.90]
[02:54.01]Lost on me
[02:55.14]
[03:00.81]I will always love you for what it's worth
[03:05.24]
[03:06.53]We'll never fade like graffiti on the overpass
[03:10.68]
[03:11.66]I know time may change the way your think of us
[03:16.13]
[03:16.78]But I'll remember the way we were
[03:18.63]You were the first full stop love that will never leave
[03:23.04]
[03:24.49]And baby you will never be lost on me
[03:30.96]
[03:33.17]Yeah yeah yeah
[03:34.82]
[03:35.65]Yeah yeah yeah
[03:37.56]Lost on me
[03:42.28]
[03:46.40]Graffiti on the overpass
